\centering

\nput{-90.0}{P0}{$$}

\nput{210.0}{P5}{$$}

\ncline[arrows=->]{P5}{P0}
\ncline[arrows=->]{P2}{P1}

\ncline[arrows=->]{P3}{P4}
\ncline[arrows=->,linestyle=dotted,dotsep=1pt]{P4}{P5}
\end{pspicture}
